text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Amusement device" means a machine for public use that is activated by a coin or token and the result of whose operation depends wholly or partly on the skill of the player, whether or not the machine rewards a successful player.
"Amusement device" does not include a service or vending machine.

text.section: "Garrett County amusement device license" means a license issued by the clerk to keep an amusement device for public use in Garrett County.
